code: import _objectSpread from"E:\\rakesh\\reactjs\\newsapp\\node_modules\\@babel\\runtime\\helpers\\esm\\objectSpread2.js";export var reducer=function reducer(state,action){if(action.type==="REMOVE_ITEM"){return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{item:state.item.filter(function(curItem){return curItem.id!==action.payload;})});}if(action.type==="CLEAR_ITEM"){return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{item:[]});}if(action.type==="INCREMENT_QUANT"){var updateCart=state.item.map(function(curItem){if(curItem.id===action.payload){return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},curItem),{},{quantity:curItem.quantity+1});}return curItem;});return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{item:updateCart});}if(action.type==="DECREMENT_QUANT"){var _updateCart=state.item.map(function(curItem){if(curItem.id===action.payload){return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},curItem),{},{quantity:curItem.quantity-1});}return curItem;});return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{item:_updateCart});}return state;};
